content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a polished_blackstone_slab, I need to place three polished_blackstone side by side in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move a polished_blackstone from slot 34 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Since there is already a polished_blackstone in slot 1, I will now move another polished_blackstone to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Since there are already two polished_blackstone in slots 1 and 2, I will now move the last polished_blackstone to slot 3, which is to the right of slot 2.
act: move from slot 34 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone_slab
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "magenta_terracotta", "quantity": 40, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 37, "index": 17}, {"type": "diorite", "quantity": 4, "index": 18}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 25}, {"type": "dead_brain_coral", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "obsidian", "quantity": 28, "index": 33}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Since there are now three polished_blackstone in slots 1, 2, and 3, I can craft the polished_blackstone_slab and move it to an empty slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
